column5: A huge packet of thunderstorms are about to hit your area. Batten down the hatches!
I see the clouds here now !!! maybe another worm pickin night
Paris just got hit with one that is heading your way as well. Really strong winds but did not last long. This area is actually under a severe storm warning now.Just a heads up.
Cp24 is reporting a funnel clouds spotted on radar and confirmed by ground spotters , just north of London. Be careful out there!
I think it came and went, we didn't end up in oz so I think we're okay
Just got back from Detroit. Headed past London around 5.30. Very strange looking cloud formation but no funnel clouds unless they were behind me......

I just got home went out to play some basketball with a couple buddies and got soaked head to toe. The storms were crazy one mintue it was nice and sunny next mintue the thundering was cracking so loud it made your ears ring. Sure feels good to be home and dry again

Brutal...  WhiteFox  calls me at 4pm and says lets go carping, picks me up at 5 and we are making our way to the harbour, to a grey sky as we are driving there it's turning darker and darker, then the rain starts - buckets pouring out, wipers on high were not enough  We tried  I'm so lucky to have her  Love ya Babe!!
